Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: The only down side for me was that the game wasn't running in 60 fps. Otherwise it is great! One of my favourite games of 2015. I love games like heavy rain etc\, where most of the game is a cinematic and let's u make all the choices and every choice have different outcomes. I'd like to see more horror games made this way in the future.
